aiCTX (ai-ctx.com) | Real-time low-power machine learning | SW Eng., Silicon HW Eng., ML research | Zürich, Switzerland | ONSITE, INTERNS, FULL-TIME

http://bit.ly/aiCTX_jobs1

aiCTX is a small (<10 employees) startup based in Switzerland, with a diverse group of SW, HW and ML engineers. We design ultra low power analog and mixed-signal neuromorphic silicon, built for real-time machine learning applications.

We're looking for awesome people to help build our SW stack; to help our HW designers for the next round of chips; and to help our research team build solutions for particular application domains.

Zürich is cool, and Switzerland is beautiful. :)

Check out the position details in the link above if you'd like to join us!
